summary: Another scene from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! My Solo, Tessa, and our Netrunner, XP, were trapped inside a ship...
caption: Another scene from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! My Solo, Tessa, and our Netrunner, XP, were trapped inside a ship while everything around them was exploding. Tessa had to punch the hell out of a locked bulletproof door and somehow managed to save us before it was too late. Amazing game, but so much anxiety… :’)

reblog.comment: Another scene from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! My Solo, Tessa, and our Netrunner, XP, were trapped inside a ship while everything around them was exploding. Tessa had to punch the hell out of a locked bulletproof door and somehow managed to save us before it was too late. Amazing game, but so much anxiety… :’)

summary:
Right so, what do you want/ expect from CDPR at E3 this year? They say it’s gonna be big!
Two games from them have been...
body:
Right so, what do you want/ expect from CDPR at E3 this year? They say it’s gonna be big!

Two games from them have been confirmed by 2021 and one is Cyberpunk 2077 (duh) and the other is unnamed but I’ve heard speculation it’s a Ciri spinoff.

Now, I reckon there will be a Cyberpunk 2077 release date announced. BUT CDPR are like the black sheep of AAA games studios. Will they do something crazy? Just release the game there and then?! They have to do something extreme!

At the very least I want some male!V gameplay!!

Discuss

reblog.comment:

Now, I reckon there will be a Cyberpunk 2077 release date announced. BUT CDPR are like the black sheep of AAA games studios. Will they do something crazy? Just release the game there and then?! They have to do something extreme!

At the very least I want some male!V gameplay!!

Discuss

summary: Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over
title: Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over
body:
Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over

The History of Mission Design 

Every game has them in some form or another: – The mission. It has its objectives and things the player must achieve to advance the story. One of game development’s must frustrating design blocks is mission design, and it plagues developers and gamers alike. Everyone remembers the insta-fail stealth mission from well… numerous Ubisoft titles come to mind. In CD…

summary: Cyberpunk 2077: fallar una misión no supone morir pero si un cambio en la historia
title: Cyberpunk 2077: fallar una misión no supone morir pero si un cambio en la historia
body:
Cyberpunk 2077: fallar una misión no supone morir pero si un cambio en la historia

En prácticamente todos los juegos estamos acostumbrados a que al errar en una misión, ésta se reinicia y debemos volver a intentarla. Pocas son las veces que los juegos reinventan su narrativa en función de una acontecimiento de tal magnitud dentro de su propia historia.

Cyberpunk 2077 quiere acabar con esta forma de jugar y el fallo en una misión de su historia no supondrá el clásico “game…

summary: A couple of drawings from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! The top guy is Rainmaker, our Fixer, trying to explain us why...
caption: A couple of drawings from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! The top guy is Rainmaker, our Fixer, trying to explain us why his nickname is the best thing ever; the second guy is Update, a Netrunner NPC who gave us the creeps in a really scary encounter in the Cyberspace.

reblog.comment: A couple of drawings from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! The top guy is Rainmaker, our Fixer, trying to explain us why his nickname is the best thing ever; the second guy is Update, a Netrunner NPC who gave us the creeps in a really scary encounter in the Cyberspace.

PlayStation 5 – Neues Patent zur Abwärtskompatibilität aufgetaucht

Ein neues Patent zur angeblichen Abwärtskompatibilität der PlayStation 5 ist mal wieder aufgetaucht. Vielleicht können wir dann doch die alten PS2-Klassiker auf der nächsten PlayStation spielen!

summary: The biggest dick move Project red could do is during E3. It gets all dark the trailer plays some dude steps out and says. You...
body: The biggest dick move Project red could do is during E3. It gets all dark the trailer plays some dude steps out and says. You can buy the game that day. summary: CD Projekt Red: Präsentation auf E3 2019 wird die wichtigste in der gesamten Firmengeschichte
title: CD Projekt Red: Präsentation auf E3 2019 wird die wichtigste in der gesamten Firmengeschichte
body:
In einem Livestream von CD Projekt Red, in dem es vorwiegend um Finanzen und Profite ging, wurde gestern auch verlautbart, dass die kommende E3 den wichtigsten Auftritt des Unternehmens überhaupt enthalten werde. Mit den vagen Worten, dass eine starke Show geboten werde, ließ man die Zuseher jedoch im Dunkeln über den genauen Inhalt besagter Präsentation. Während man von einer Veröffentlichung…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas
title: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas

Sin lugar a dudas, Cyberpunk 2077 es uno de los títulos más esperados en lo que queda de la actual generación de consolas. Pero, a tenor de lo indicado por CD Projekt RED en las últimas horas, también lo será de la primera hornada de juegos de PS5 y la sucesora de Xbox One.

El estudio polaco ha presentado sus resultados financieros para el año fiscal 2018 y en ellos se detalla el estado del…

View On WordPress
